Package boundary

Class MovieUI

java.lang.Object
boundary.MovieUI
public class MovieUI extends Object
Represents the boundary of movie Consisting of multiple methods which interact directly with movieController to display movies and related information
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.0

    mc
    MovieController which interact directly with database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    admin()
    Called from AdminUI, provide admin configuration for movies as follows: 1) Displaying all movies (all show status), and detailed view for each movie 2) Create new movie 3) Edit various information in existing movie
    private static void
    createMovie()
    Admin function to create new movie
    private static void
    displayAllMovies()
    Display all movies regardless of the show status, used by admin.
    static void
    displayAllShowingMovies()
     
    static void
    displayBasicInfoMovies(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
     
    private static void
    displayDetailMovieInfo(int movieId)
    Display detailed movie information and its reviews
    private static void
    editMovie()
    Admin function to edit existing movie
    static void
    main()
    Called in App.java to show all movies except sorted by category, except the category 'END_OF_SHOWING' should not be showed here.
    static int
    promptValidMovieId(boolean prev, boolean comingSoon, boolean end)
    Prompt the user for a valid movie ID, and return the movie ID selected Display appropriate error message if movie ID is invalid or if access not allowed It takes three boolean arguments: prev, comingSoon, end If prev is true, movie with status of 'PREVIEW' can be selected If comingSoon is true, movie with status of 'COMING_SOON' can be selected If end is true, movie with status of 'END_OF_SHOWING' can be selected All movies with status 'NOW_SHOWING' can always be selected
    static void
    rankMoviesByRating(int num)
     
    static void
    rankMoviesBySales(int num)
     
    static void
    searchMovie()
    Prompts user for a searchQuery Displays all movies whose title is a substring of the searchQuery (case insensitive) It can search for movies with any show status (including end_of_showing)

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • mc

      private static MovieController mc
      MovieController which interact directly with database

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieUI

      public MovieUI()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main()
      Called in App.java to show all movies except sorted by category, except the category 'END_OF_SHOWING' should not be showed here. It then prompts the user for a valid movie ID, then show a detailed view of a particular movie ID.

    • searchMovie

      public static void searchMovie()
      Prompts user for a searchQuery Displays all movies whose title is a substring of the searchQuery (case insensitive) It can search for movies with any show status (including end_of_showing)

    • promptValidMovieId

      public static int promptValidMovieId(boolean prev, boolean comingSoon, boolean end)
      Prompt the user for a valid movie ID, and return the movie ID selected Display appropriate error message if movie ID is invalid or if access not allowed It takes three boolean arguments: prev, comingSoon, end If prev is true, movie with status of 'PREVIEW' can be selected If comingSoon is true, movie with status of 'COMING_SOON' can be selected If end is true, movie with status of 'END_OF_SHOWING' can be selected All movies with status 'NOW_SHOWING' can always be selected

    • admin

      public static void admin()
      Called from AdminUI, provide admin configuration for movies as follows: 1) Displaying all movies (all show status), and detailed view for each movie 2) Create new movie 3) Edit various information in existing movie

    • displayAllMovies

      private static void displayAllMovies()
      Display all movies regardless of the show status, used by admin. It then prompts the admin for a movie ID to show detailed view.

    • displayAllShowingMovies

      public static void displayAllShowingMovies()

    • rankMoviesBySales

      public static void rankMoviesBySales(int num)

    • rankMoviesByRating

      public static void rankMoviesByRating(int num)

    • displayBasicInfoMovies

      public static void displayBasicInfoMovies(ArrayList<Movie> movies)

    • displayDetailMovieInfo

      private static void displayDetailMovieInfo(int movieId)
      Display detailed movie information and its reviews

    • createMovie

      private static void createMovie()
      Admin function to create new movie

    • editMovie

      private static void editMovie()
      Admin function to edit existing movie
